data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Komai, Tomoyuki, Saito, Yuma, Myorin, Eiji (2015): A new species of the hermit crab genus Pagurus Fabricius, 1775 (Crustacea: Decapoda: Anomura: Paguridae) from shallow coastal waters in Japan, with a checklist of the East Asian species of the genus. Zootaxa 3918 (2): 224-238, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3918.2.4
